lyrics:
2 contributorsall ghetto girl lyricsverse 1
can somebody tell me whats goin on
im gettin tired of fake rich wannabes
runnin up my card spendin my money
actin all smart with no degrees
dont like my friends cause youre too boujee yeah

prechorus
never wanna go to an rbhiphop show never wanna go to see hiphop
its funny but i had more
fun when i had no dough i need a girl from the ghetto

chorus
i need an all ghetto girl i need a bad mother with designer
toes tattoos and golds straight up ghetto
dont matter if i aint got no dough shes gonna be my boo
gonna be my crew ohh ghetto girl

verse 2
i need a girl from bk or the boogie down
compton long beach or maybe chitown
the atl or the dirty south
she can be from watts cause thats my part of town hey

never wanna go to an rbhiphop show shes acting up but it
funny but i had more fun when i had no dough

you might also likechorus
i need an all ghetto girl i need a bad mother with designer
toes tattoos and golds straight up ghetto

verse 3

rasheeda ashonda shaneiqa and shawna
karen pam tina ooh yeah brenda kenya and natalie

never wanna go to an rbhiphop show never wanna go see hiphop

baby

chorus
i need an all ghetto girl i need a bad mother with designer
toes tattoos and golds straight up ghetto
dont matter if i aint got no dough shes gonna be my boo

verse 4
i was sitting up talking to this girl one day ghetto ghetto
and this is what she told me
she said tyrese it dont matter if you nba nfl or you sing
you gotta buy me everything and i told her back in response when i met ya you had a bucket
your 2 dollars is what ya stuck with
youre high maintenance im not feelin it baby girl

shes gonna be my boo gonna be my crew oh ghetto girl

i need a girl from the ghetto i need an all ghetto girl
i can take you anywhere i go
i would like a ghetto girl
dont matter if i aint got no dough
said its all about my baby from the ghetto
i know this
ladadada dadadada
